content.body:

Did you see the big red box saying that there are lots of problems with the DOMParser / XMLSerializer specs? This one reminds me of one of them... https://github.com/w3c/DOM-Parsing/issues
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @akaster:serenityos.org
hm. maybe our patch to add that was in error anyway. doesn't fail any of our local tests to remove it ðŸ˜…
Did you see the big red box saying that there are lots of problems with the DOMParser / XMLSerializer specs? This one reminds me of one of them... https://github.com/w3c/DOM-Parsing/issues

content.body: None of the other engines produce a result with the xml ns applied. We just slapped that into our XML document parser while referencing https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/infrastructure.html#xml
